entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Only use keyed services when keyed service provider is available #50277
    8.0-rc2
  • Add docs for anti-forgery and form updates in minimal API #50275
    8.0-rc2
  • AddAuthentication with JwtBearerScheme and IConfigureOptions doesn't work #50274
  • Perf regression: caching, single_query #50270
  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #50269
  • PageTitle doesn't display for SSR pages in mixed render mode app #50268
  • Make the PageTitle-component able to be set with prerendering turned off #50267
  • Blazor SSR chooses RemoteNavigationManager or HttpNavigationManager unpredictably #50260
    .NET 9 Planning
  • NativeAOT with reflection disabled working in .NET 7, not in .NET 8 for new KestrelServer #50255
  • Parallel JS -> .NET byte arrays retrieval fails #50254
    Backlog
  • Multipart body length limit 16384 exceeded in NET CORE #50252

Closed

  • WASM IndexOutOfRangeException inside RenderTreeDiffBuilder.AppendAttributeDiffEntriesForRange #49192
    8.0-rc2
  • Support account lockout with identity endpoints #47232
    8.0-preview7
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson on ApplicationParts #50271
  • [.NET 8 Preview 7] PageTitle doesn't update when disabling Prerendering using Blazor Web App #50209
  • RenderModeSSR #50206
  • Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error MSB3027 Could not copy "E:\15. Code Learning\Learning\Core.Application\bin\Debug\net8.0\Core.Application.dll" to "bin\Debug\net8.0\Core.Application.dll". Exceeded retry count of 10. Failed. The file is locked by: ".NET Host (4176)" Presentation.MVC d:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Preview\MSBuild\Current\Bin\amd64\Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets 4879 #50200
  • Storybook Support #50262
  • Handle dotnet/extensions scenarios in ASP.NET http logging middleware #48667
    8.0
  • RateLimiter is not working if I use IHost/IHostBuilder #50244
  • SSR EditForm in .NET 8 Preview 7 not firing validation? #50256
  • Perf regression: endpoint #50216

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update SDK #50276
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove reflection from KestrelServer constructor #50272
    area-runtime
  • Ensure enhanced nav requests have the correct headers #50263
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix SSR redirection when coming from a non-root URL #50261
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • In SSR, supply HttpContext as cascading value #50253
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Use polling to watch certificate paths #50251
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50265
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix IndexOutOfRangeException when an added/removed attribute spans a buffer size boundary #50110
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Add benchmarks for RDG #50266
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2
  • Update to tough-cookie@4.1.3 in repo #50264
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix flaky tests CanCacheRouteTable #49680
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1
  • [SignalR][TS client] Stateful reconnect #49940
    area-signalr, feature-client-javascript, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #50234
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50222
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • [SignalR] Pass new App to Transport Pipe to App layer #49650
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0-rc1
  • Resolve interceptor location using identifier name #50245
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Test updating SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #50278
    area-infrastructure
  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-runtime, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2249980 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Make it clear in the bot comment that repros must be GitHub repos and not ZIPs #50149
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    blocked, area-runtime, area-routing
  • Add exclusion for `.vsconfig` file to CI #50203
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
